entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
